text: Hello Robert! Lab 00 is the lab where you document your computer specs as part of your lab report. You don't have to post a screenshot of your profile in the lab 00 channel, as long as you report it in your lab report. There are additional steps as well, so check out the lab instructions under the Lab 00 tab in blackboard.

text: The introduction is just a couple of sentences in the beginning of the lab to explain what the lab is about. The caption is an short explanation of what the screenshot is. The process is the actual steps you took or your answer to the questions. I hope this makes sense.
